### University of Wollongong

#### **Overview**
This is a simple GitHub page to host some activities for the BIOL361 cohort. It includes the Weeks [four](DoreyPrac1/Prac1_BIOL361.html) and five practicals by James Dorey and some associated files, like the interactive [Richmond Birdwing map](https://jbdorey.github.io/BIOL361_25/Ornithoptera%20richmondia.html).

* [Practical five]
